name: Laserworks
description:
30 levels of laser madness! Use filters, mirrors and splitters to deliver the right power to the targets with the minimum equipment possible.  Tutorial provided in-game.

Game saves are not working (Bug report on GH) and your progress will be lost if you reload the page. You can download the game and play it locally or save the data manually by accessing the local storage data with the developer tools and copying it to a text file, then importing them when you come back to the game.  Sorry!

Source code available on github
